query: When was I admitted to hospice?
resource_summaries:
This record documents a completed procedure for hospice care that took place at NORTH RIVER HOSPICE LLC on February 26, 2023.
This record is about an encounter where a patient was admitted to hospice due to chronic kidney disease stage 4. The encounter was performed by Dr. Joline Stark at North River Hospice LLC.
answer: Based on your medical record, you were admitted to hospice on February 26, 2023, due to chronic kidney disease stage 4. This encounter was performed by Dr. Joline Stark at North River Hospice LLC.
